entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to 1200 metres overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to near valley bottom after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
